name: cave_entrance
descriptions: You are standing in a cold, dark cave. You are looking directly into the darkness. You can feel the cold breeze on your neck indicating to you that the entrance is behind you.

name: cave_interior
descriptions: You are actually in the back of the cave. It does not go back very deep, it is just incredibly dark.

name: testing_void
descriptions: I am an inky pink void for testing purposes. How did you get in here?
